abi: error Voting_AlreadyVoted_Error(address voter, uint256 voteId, string message)
error Voting_Ended_Error(address voter, uint256 voteId, string message)
error Voting_InvalidVote_Error(address voter, uint256 voteId, string message)
error Voting_OptionsRange_Error(address voter, uint256 minOptions, uint256 maxOptions, string message)
error Voting_VoteOptionInvalid_Error(address voter, uint256 voteId, uint8 option, string message)
event Member_Joined(address indexed newMember, uint256 timestamp)
event Vote_Created(address indexed owner, uint256 voteId, uint8 options, uint256 time, uint256 endtime)
event Voted(address indexed voter, uint256 voteId, uint8 voteOption)
function createVote(string url, uint256 endTime, uint8 options) returns (uint256 voteId)
function didVote(address member, uint256 voteId) view returns (bool)
function getVote(uint256 voteId) view returns (string url, address owner, uint8 options, uint256 createdAt, uint256 endTime, uint256[] optionsVotes)
function getVoteOptionVotes(uint256 voteId, uint8 option) view returns (uint256 optionVotes)
function isMember(address addr) view returns (bool member)
